The filing says Eric Schmidt is selling the stock as part of his long-term strategy for individual asset diversification and liquidity. Eric Schmidt has sold Google stock before, notably after the company's initial public offering in 2004 when he sold shares worth roughly$ 258 million. our worst day in government," a senior aide from David Cameron 's Downing Street office told The Guardian, after Andy Coulson quit as chief of communications on Friday. The left-wing newspaper added that Andy Coulson 's departure leaves the prime minister with a crucial vacancy as the coalition government weathers dissent about cuts in public spending introduced to reduce a huge budget deficit.
